duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide superior customer service, assess customer needs, recommend products/services, communicate sales/promotions, resolve customer complaints, and ensure customer satisfaction.
Complete basic vehicle service tasks including tire services, engine oil and filter changes, battery testing/maintenance, fluid replacement, bulb and wiper replacement, and alignment checks.
Perform store operational tasks such as opening/closing procedures, unloading/store stocking, product inventories, set-up/maintenance of store displays, and general cleaning.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, valid automobile driver's license, completion of required store education courses and modules
